files.README.md:
# PrinterPix Claude Code Plugins

> Official plugin marketplace for PrinterPix development tools and AI-powered code generators

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Claude Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Claude-Code-purple.svg)](https://code.claude.com/)

## Overview

This marketplace provides specialized Claude Code plugins designed for the PrinterPix e-commerce platform development workflow. Each plugin leverages AI to understand our codebase patterns and generate production-ready code that follows our architecture and conventions.

## Available Plugins

### ðŸŒŸ Jamun - AI Code Generator

AI-powered Qwik code generator with deep codebase understanding and real-time documentation integration.

**Key Features:**
- ðŸ” **Context7 Integration** - Queries latest Qwik documentation in real-time
- ðŸ§  **Pattern Recognition** - Understands PrinterPix architecture from CLAUDE.md
- âš¡ **Production-Ready** - Generates typed, tested, production-quality code
- ðŸŽ¯ **Specialized Commands** - 6 domain-specific generators for different code types
- ðŸŒ **Multi-Region Support** - Handles PrinterPix's 9-region architecture
- âœ¨ **Auto-Format** - Integrates with Prettier for consistent code style

**Available Commands:**
- `/jamun:write` - Intelligent general-purpose code generation
- `/jamun:component` - Qwik components with proper signals/stores
- `/jamun:service` - API services with error handling
- `/jamun:route` - Routes with loaders and SEO
- `/jamun:context` - Context providers with proper typing
- `/jamun:form` - Forms with @modular-forms and validation

[ðŸ“š Read Full Documentation â†’](./docs/jamun/README.md)

## Quick Start

### Prerequisites

- Claude Code CLI installed
- Node.js >= 22.0.0
- pnpm 10.21.0+
- GitHub account with repository access

### Installation

**1. Set up GitHub authentication (for private repo):**

```bash
# Windows (PowerShell)
$env:GITHUB_TOKEN = "ghp_your_token_here"

# macOS/Linux
export GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_your_token_here
```

[ðŸ“– Detailed token setup instructions â†’](./docs/GITHUB-TOKEN-SETUP.md)

**2. Add marketplace to Claude Code:**

```bash
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/allanmosesfernandes97/ClaudePackages.git
```

**3. Install Jamun plugin:**

```bash
/plugin install jamun@printerpix-plugins
```

**4. Navigate to project and start using:**

```bash
cd C:\ecommerce-frontend-qwik

# Example: Generate a product card component
/jamun:component "Create a ProductCard component with image, title, price, and add-to-cart button"

# Example: Create an API service
/jamun:service "Create a wishlist service with add, remove, and get methods"

# Example: Build a new route
/jamun:route "Create a /gift-finder route with product recommendations"
```

### First-Time Setup

After installation, test the plugin:

```bash
# 1. Verify installation
/plugin list

# 2. Test basic generation
/jamun:write "Create a simple greeting component"

# 3. Test Context7 integration
/jamun:component "Create a component using useVisibleTask$"
```

Expected: Code generated with latest Qwik patterns and proper documentation references.

| Plugin | Version | Category | Description |
|--------|---------|----------|-------------|
| **jamun** | 1.0.0 | Productivity | AI code generator for Qwik/PrinterPix with Context7 |

## Architecture

```
printerpix-ClaudePackages/
â”œâ”€â”€ .claude-plugin/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ marketplace.json          # Marketplace catalog
â”œâ”€â”€ plugins/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ jamun/                    # Jamun plugin
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ .claude-plugin/
â”‚       â”‚   â””â”€â”€ plugin.json       # Plugin manifest
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ commands/
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ write.md          # General code generation
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ component.md      # Component generator
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ service.md        # Service generator
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ route.md          # Route generator
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ context.md        # Context generator
â”‚           â””â”€â”€ form.md           # Form generator
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/

```

## Updating Plugins

To get the latest plugin versions:

```bash
# Update marketplace
/plugin marketplace update printerpix-plugins

# Reinstall plugin to get updates
/plugin uninstall jamun@printerpix-plugins
/plugin install jamun@printerpix-plugins
```

## Support & Contribution

### Getting Help

- **Issues**: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/allanmosesfernandes97/ClaudePackages/issues)
- **Team Support**: Reach out in dev channel or via DM
- **Documentation**: Check docs/ directory for guides

### Reporting Bugs

Use our [bug report template](./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md) to report issues.

### Feature Requests

Open an issue with:
- Clear use case description
- Example command/expected output
- How it improves the workflow

## Roadmap

### v1.1.0 (Planned)
- [ ] `/jamun:test` - Test file generation
- [ ] `/jamun:hook` - Custom Qwik hooks
- [ ] Enhanced error handling with recovery suggestions

### v2.0.0 (Future)
- [ ] Visual Studio Code extension integration
- [ ] Interactive component preview
- [ ] Multi-file refactoring support

## Version History

See [CHANGELOG.md](./CHANGELOG.md) for detailed version history.

## Technology Stack

- **Framework**: Qwik 1.17.2
- **Language**: TypeScript 5.9
- **Package Manager**: pnpm 10.21.0
- **Documentation**: Context7 MCP integration
- **AI**: Claude Sonnet 4.5

## License

MIT License - see [LICENSE](./LICENSE) file for details.

## Team

Maintained by PrinterPix Development Team

---

**Questions?** Check [Team Installation Guide](./docs/TEAM-INSTALL.md) or reach out to the dev team.
